Guntitat Sawadwuthikul

School of Computing, Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST)

Computer science student from Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology. Interested in machine learning research and web development. During free time, I mostly play the guitar and watch DOTA2 streams.

Feel free to check out my CV which contains my contact information you might need.

News

  1. 2023/02: I officially graduated from KAIST with a Summa Cum Laude. Thanks KAIST for a wonderful journey for the past years!
  2. 2022/12: I will join Gauss Labs next March!
  3. 2022/03: Joined Interfaces lab as a research assistant under supervision of Prof. Theerawit Wilaiprasitporn.
  4. 2022/01: SCB Data Analytics Team offered me a summer internship position.
  5. 2021/11: My research work has appeared live on MCOT channel. (Link)
Work Experience

Reseach Assistant

Interfaces Lab, Vidyasirimedhi Institute of Science and Technology (VISTEC)
  • March 2022 - Ongoing
  • Remote

Apply deep learning to extract biosignals and events (e.g. respiratory rate and sleep apnea) from PPG signals under supervision of Prof. Theerawit Wilaiprasitporn.

Data Analyst Intern

Siam Commercial Bank
  • June 2022 - August 2022
  • Bangkok, Thailand

Join the Credit Risk Data Analytics team to improve the reject inference method applied to the bank's decision engine.

Research Intern

IBS Data Science Group
  • January 2022 - August 2022
  • Daejeon, South Korea

Climate downscaling with single-image superresolution technique to predict geospatial information under supervision of Prof. Meeyoung Cha.

Robotics Engineer Intern

AI and Robotic Ventures
  • January 2022 - February 2022
  • Bangkok, Thailand

Integrate sensors and embedded devices to create an end-to-end hydrographic surveyor to be installed with the unmanned subsea vehicle.

Backend Developer Intern

True Digital Group
  • June 2021 - August 2021
  • Work from Home

Qualify through True Academy Program as a backend developer at True Digital Group. Implement PoCs that increase the efficiency of API calls for content management of TrueID application.

Research Internship

  • Rayong, Thailand

Research in the field of machine learning, human-computer interaction, reinforcement learning, and robotics under supervision of Prof. Poramate Manoonpong and Dr. Nat Dilokthanakul.

Work as a part of a social enterprise, organizing science camps, educational workshops and lectures. Both for charity work and profiting purposes.
